page.title: 02TOWN CENTRE, SWADLINCOTE.
page.content: In the town centre there are approximately{40}shops. The oldest shop is{Vanity Flairs}which was built 100 years ago. All shops open for five and a half days a week.{Wednesdays}are half day closing. They open in a morning at 9.30 am until 5.30 pm. In {Swadlincote}only{pedestrians}are allowed to use the roads in the daytime.{International}is the most popular shop in Swadlincote. It is a supermarket. There are fashion shops, furniture shops and supermarkets. At Christmas time there are lights and a Christmas tree. There are some pubs, amusement arcades, banks, building societies, chip shops, chemists, a joke shop, newsagents, gas and electrical shops, car showrooms, bakers, a pet shop, betting shops, shoe shops and lots more.
